Container.Name: WhisperX Subtitle Translator
Container.Overview: A Dockerized Python script to generate and translate subtitles using WhisperX (large-v3) for transcription and Hugging Face MarianMT for translation, optimized for Unraid with GPU support.
Container.DonateText: If you find this useful, consider starring the GitHub repo!

Config.Name: Input Path
Config.Description: Pad op Unraid waar je video's staan. SRT-bestanden worden hier opgeslagen.

Config.Name: Language
Config.Description: 2-letter ISO taalcode (bijv. nl, en, de, fr).
